Deprecated List (Oracle Database Globalization Development Kit Java API Reference)

Oracle® Database Globalization Development Kit Java API Reference
12c Release 1 (12.1)
E37513-01
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors

Deprecated Methods
oracle.i18n.net.MimeUtility.encodeText(String)
          As of 10.1.2, use encodeText(text, charset, encoding) instead. 
oracle.i18n.util.OraResourceBundle.getBundle(String)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraResourceBundle.getBundle(String, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraNumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraNumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getDateInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getDateInstance(int, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getDateInstance(int)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getDateInstance(int, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getDateTimeInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(int, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(int)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(int, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraNumberFormat.getInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraNumberFormat.getInstance(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(int, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraCollator.getInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraCollator.getInstance(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraNumberFormat.getNumberInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraNumberFormat.getNumberInstance(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormat.getTimeInstance()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormat.getTimeInstance(Locale) 

 

Deprecated Constructors
oracle.i18n.text.OraDateFormatSymbols()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDateFormatSymbols.OraDateFormatSymbols(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDecimalFormat()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDecimalFormat.OraDecimalFormat(String, OraDecimalFormatSymbols) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDecimalFormat(String)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDecimalFormat.OraDecimalFormat(String, OraDecimalFormatSymbols) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraDecimalFormatSymbols()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraDecimalFormatSymbols.OraDecimalFormatSymbols(Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraSimpleDateFormat()
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraSimpleDateFormat.OraSimpleDateFormat(String, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraSimpleDateFormat(String)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraSimpleDateFormat.OraSimpleDateFormat(String, Locale) 
oracle.i18n.text.OraSimpleDateFormat(String, OraDateFormatSymbols)
          As of Oracle Database 10g Release 2 (10.2), replaced by OraSimpleDateFormat.OraSimpleDateFormat(String, OraDateFormatSymbols, Locale)
